name: Balz.io
description:
Your objective is to eat as many other cells as possible by overlapping them. Larger cells can eat you, but are slower and can be easily outrun. Green, spiky cells known as "Viruses" will explode larger into many smaller cells if eaten.

Controls:
- Move your cell with the mouse.
- Press or hold W to eject mass.
- Press SPACE to split your cells.
- Press D to split your cells twice.
- Press Q to switch between player and minion controls.
- Press ESC to show or hide the menu.

Controls can be reconfigured in the keybinds menu.
